article_title: Denied: WH Refuses Union Pleas for Obamacare Waivers
parent_text:
Our Politicians so corrupt and stupid that they give Tax Rebates to people who don't pay any taxes! Margaret Thatcher was right!
Socialism is great until they run out of other people's money! I think we're almost there! When we get there, It won't be pretty!
comment_texts:

"government" spends is borrowed money.
